section.section: A fundraiser conducted under this part shall be managed and operated only by members of the organization that receives the permit for the fundraiser.
A person may not be compensated for the management or operation of any gaming activity authorized by the permit.
Each organization that receives a permit for a fundraiser under this part shall designate an individual who is responsible for complying with the terms and conditions of the permit and this part.

text.section:
An organization that receives a permit for a fundraiser under this part shall conduct the fundraiser in:
a structure that is owned, leased, or occupied by the organization;
a structure that is owned, leased, or occupied by an organization that would qualify for a permit under § 13-2621 of this subtitle; or
a public location that is described in the permit application and approved by the State's Attorney for the county.
